name: Debug Politics
description:
Debug Politics is a hackathon for anyone dissatisfied with the state of our politics. Transform your dissatisfaction into a unique idea. Let‚Äôs use our talents as developers, designers, marketers, entrepreneurs, etc. to find innovative ways to make a real difference.

name: Universal 2nd Factor
description:
Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) is an open authentication standard that provides users a stronger, easier to use, form of two-factor authentication. To jumpstart implementing U2F into your own websites or services, checkout the projects below.

Learn more about the U2F specification from the FIDO Alliance.
Order a U2F-compatible device from our partner Yubico.
Get information about enabling U2F on your GitHub account from our Help article.
